# featureColumnNames

**Instance Property**

The names of the columns containing feature values.

## Declaration

```swift
var featureColumnNames: [String] { get }
```

## Getting the properties

- **classCount**: The number of classes.
- **predictionColumnName**: The name of the column containing the predicted labels.

items.description: The name of the column containing the predicted labels.
